dataset.titleFlag: Boolean value to determine the input text -> bool
dataset.shuffleFlag: Shuffle flag for the dataset loader -> bool
dataset.numWorkers: Number of workers for the dataloader -> int

model.hiddenUnits: Hidden units in the classifier -> int
model.dropoutValue: Dropout value for the model -> float

train.learningRate: Learning rate for model training -> float
train.checkpointToBeContinued: Checkpoint to be continued if continue flag is given as True -> string
train.startEpoch: Starting epoch for model training -> int
train.endEpoch: Ending epoch for model training -> int
train.logsPath: Logs path to save the training logs -> string
